column2: "/ci1 1 Oh, well hello there. Think you could lend me a hand here?"
"/ci2 1 ...Thanks for the help. Good luck out there."
"/ci4 3 Things are looking bad! Sorry, I have to retreat."
"/ci1 1 Oh, hello there. Think you could lend me a hand here?"
"/ci2 1 ...Thanks for the help. Good luck out there."
"/ci4 3 Things are looking bad! Sorry, I have to retreat."
"/ci1 2 Uh-oh. This isn't what I expected..._b"
"/ci2 1 Phew... Looks like we made it._a"
"/ci4 3 Ngh... I think I might have broke something... I'm just gonna make my way back to the City, okay?"
"/ci1 2 Uh-oh. This isn't what I expected..."
"/ci2 1 Phew... Looks like we made it."
"/ci4 3 Ngh... I think I might have broke something... I'm just gonna make my way back to the City, okay?"
"Oh, thank goodness! I'm in a little over my head here... Think you could give me a hand thinning out these numbers?"
"Phew... we made it... Thanks so much. You really saved me there. I'll see you later!"
"This is too dangerous! Sorry, I'm getting out of here."

"あっ、いいところに！
ちょっと数が多くて大変だから
手伝って貰えないかな？_b"

"ふう、なんとかなったぁ……
素直にありがとね、助かったよ。
それじゃ、また！_a"
